verses.verse: Then said <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> unto me <WH3212>, Go yet <WH157>, love a woman <WH802> beloved <WH157> of her friend <WH7453>, yet a adulteress <WH5003>, according to the love <WH160> of the Lord <WH3068> toward the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, who look <WH6437> to other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and love <WH157> flagons <WH809> of wine <WH6025>.
So I bought <WH3739> her to me for fifteen <WH6240> pieces of silver <WH3701>, and for a homer <WH2563> of barley <WH8184>, and a half homer <WH3963> of barley <WH8184>:

And I said <WH559> unto her <WH3427>, You shall stay for me many <WH7227> days <WH3117>; you shall not play the prostitute <WH2181>, and you shall not be <WH1961> for another man <WH376>: so will I also be for you.

For the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall stay <WH3427> many <WH7227> days <WH3117> without a king <WH4428>, and without a prince <WH8269>, and without a sacrifice <WH2077>, and without a image <WH4676>, and without a ephod <WH646>, and without teraphim <WH8655>:

Afterward <WH310> shall the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> return <WH7725>, and seek <WH1245> the Lord <WH3068> their God <WH430>, and David <WH1732> their king <WH4428>; and shall fear <WH6342> the Lord <WH3068> and his goodness <WH2898> in the latter <WH319> days <WH3117>.
